name: Arable Land expansion Project
description: This initiative intends to increase the percentage of arable land in Nigeria from the current 35% to 65%, as this is the foundation of improving agriculture in Nigeria
kpi: Expand the arable land in Nigeria from 35% to 65%.

milestones.name: MS1
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the South West (SW)region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the South West (SW) region

milestones.name: MS2
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the South South(SS) region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the South South(SS) region

milestones.name: MS3
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the South East (SE) region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the South East (SE)

milestones.name: MS4
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the North Central (NC) region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the North Central (NC)

milestones.name: MS5
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the North East (NE) region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the North East (NE)

milestones.name: MS6
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate from land clearing companies in the North West (NW) region
milestones.description: National Agricultural Land Development Agency(NALDA) to clear eligible land in the North West (NW)

milestones.name: MS7
milestones.deliverables: Complete register and allocation of eligible farmers including demographic information such as name ,farm size and coordinates to cleared land

name: Waterways Expansion Project
objective: Harness the potential of all rivers, lakes, and waterways
description: Given the size of the nation and its economy, Nigeria should be a significant maritime player.Additionally, our inland rivers, lakes, and waterways are underutilized, both in terms of cargo shipment and passenger transportation.
kpi: Completely develop the Nigerian Maritime/Inland Waterways to the fullest potential

milestones.name: MS1
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate issued by the Nigerian Port Authority (NPA)
milestones.description: Decongest the Apapa Port and distribute traffic to other major Seaports.

milestones.name: MS2
milestones.deliverables: Project verification completion certificate issued by the Nigerian Port Authority (NPA)
milestones.description: Deepening all harbors and shipping lanes as well as enlarging berths and docking facilities to allow for the largest cargo vessels to use all Nigerian seaports.

milestones.name: MS3
milestones.deliverables: Contract completion certificate issued by the Nigerian Port Authority (NPA)
milestones.description: Dredging strategically important inland waterways to make navigation of goods and people easier.

milestones.name: MS4
milestones.deliverables: Completion reports by the Nigerian Port Authority (NPA)
milestones.description: Deepening all harbors and shipping lanes as well as enlarging berths and docking facilities to allow for the largest cargo vessels to use all Nigerian seaports.

name: Ajaokuta-Kaduna-Kano Pipeline (Phase 1)
description:
The Ajaokuta窶適aduna窶適ano Natural Gas Pipeline is a pipeline planned
  to transport natural gas from Ajaokuta, in Kogi State to Kano, in Kano State, through
  several states and urban centers, as part of the Trans Nigeria Gas Pipeline.

milestones.name: MS1
milestones.description: NNPC to submit the proposal for the Ajaokuta窶適aduna窶適ano (AKK) natural gasmpipeline project to Infrastructure Concession Regulatory Commission (ICRC) and implement any related feedback.

milestones.name: MS4
milestones.description: Complete all contractual activities and begin deployment to sites.

name: Restructuring Tertiary Institutions
objective: To build independent and resilient tetiary institutions across the nation
description: The administration will lay infrastructure to help build modern and resiliant primary,secondary and tetiary intitutions across the nation

milestones.name: MS1
milestones.description: Accreditation standards will be developed for all institutions.All institutions of learning in Nigeria will eventually be required to comply with the new standards after a reasonable period of adjustment.

milestones.name: MS2
milestones.deliverables: Results of standardised examinations and trainings
milestones.description: Standardised examintions of current lecturers and teachers and essential trainings in their respective professions.

milestones.name: MS3
milestones.deliverables: Document of Accepted students and proof of payment to their accounts
milestones.description: Provision of student loans to all eligible Nigerians regardless of their backgrounds

milestones.name: MS4
milestones.deliverables: Commissioning documents from respective technical and vocational schools.
milestones.description: Reform technical and vocational learning institutions to stimulate Nigeria's natural entrepreneurial spirit and empower more individuals toward self-reliance.
